title: How to Say Beautiful in Hawaiian

steps.title: Learn the basic word.
steps.content: Learn the basic word. The standard word beautiful is "nani". [2] X Research source It is pronounced as nah-knee . Nani can also be used for splendid and pretty. Nani kōkī (supremely beautiful) [3] X Research source

steps.title: Use the word "ho'onani" as a verb to describe beauty or to give praise.
steps.content: Use the word "ho'onani" as a verb to describe beauty or to give praise. [4] X Research source You can pronounce it as "ho-oh-nah-knee". Mea ho'onani kino (describing body jewelry) Nâ mea ho'onani (decorations in general)

steps.title: Use the word "makalapua" for handsome or blossoming (as in flower buds).
steps.content: Use the word "makalapua" for handsome or blossoming (as in flower buds). [5] X Research source It is pronounced as ma-caw-la-poo-ahh .
